itunes:title: Episode 638 - DB Sports Companion Show 07/13/20 - DeSean Jackson Goes to Auschwitz
title: Episode 638 - DB Sports Companion Show 07/13/20 - DeSean Jackson Goes to Auschwitz
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss why UFC 251 was a huge disappointment, the two explain why they will never watch Usman fight again, Washington is officially changing their name from the “Redskins” to something less offensive, Oakley has designed ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss why UFC 251 was a huge disappointment, the two explain why they will never watch Usman fight again, Washington is officially changing their name from the “Redskins” to something less offensive, Oakley has designed an in-helmet Mouth Shield that will be distributed to all 32 teams next week, and DeSean Jackson makes up for his anti-semitic posts by agreeing to visit Auschwitz with a 94 year old Holocaust survivor.

www.ghostbed.com/drinkinbros
